summary: Emil goes to Berlin to see his grandmother with a large amount of money and is offered sweets by a strange man that make him sleep. He wakes up at his stop with no money. It is up to him and a group of children to save the day.
cast: Rolf Wenkhaus|Käthe Haack|Fritz Rasp|Rudolf Biebrach|Olga Engl|Inge Landgut|Hans Joachim Schaufuß|Hans Richter|Hans Löhr|Ernst-Eberhard Reling|Waldemar Kupczyk|Martin Rickelt|Gerhard Dammann|Rudolf Lettinger|Margarete Sachse|Georg H. Schnell|Hubert Schmitz
title: Emil y los detectives
